ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing. The agent attempted to place chests in locations occupied by other entities, particularly near the mining drills. Before placing a chest, visually inspect the tile or use a function to check if the tile is clear.
